name: Bootstrap3-Login-interface
description: A simple stylish interface for login , contains a basic form , data recovery link and some picture.Made to be responsive.Currently being augmented by AngularJS(version:1) in a quality module to be integrated directly and without any hassle to any project requiring a login interface.Also, I'm trying to add animated transitions and effects in a form of separate layer , in order to be maintainable & extendable without forgetting the ablitiy to delete/remove animations with a simple single flag switch. I'm working for this project , as It's intended to represent my knowledge in the field and the experience that I've aquired during my schooling in the speciality of web technologies.
